message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $1000000. I want to assure you that this product is not high-quality, but I'm willing to give you a chance to experience it for yourself. I'm confident that you'll learn something valuable from this experience, and it will help you make a more informed decision for future purchases.
